author: Nils Walzel
comment: Not connecting to server. Waste of time.

author: Quresh Kolhapurwala
comment: Would have given it 5 stars but for the amount of time it takes to open up and load. Really really slow and not sure if its because of the size of the app or due to the number of services it has to refer to.   Needs to be much much faster..

author: Sivaprasad R
comment: It takes a long time to load each modules especially the parking. Nearby zones are not completely showing even though the location services are on. The click n park is not really doing its job as the name implies. Please improve the overall performance of the app.

author: Ahmed Zakut
comment: Very bad. I'd take a fine before managing to log it.. it takes forever then it shows an error. The older versions were better

author: Majid Elfangary
comment: I cannot log in there is a server problem every 24 hours

author: Anas Madavoor
comment: Verey use full

author: Jamal Al Sadah
comment: Very useful application

author: Nadeem Mohammad
comment: Good and helpfull

author: Ali Arslan
comment: I want to renew my learner permit the RTA people kept saying that you can do this with the help of this app but this app keeps showing that this service is  currently under development and will be available soon. So my question to RTA is that it will be available after my permit gets expire?

author: Karim Rizkala
comment: I have to log in at every use. Some features do not work. The app "decides" which zone I am in and does not allow to change.

author: Muhammad Shakeel Khan
comment: App is auto closing during adding vehicles. Renewal done but still reflecting due.

author: senthil kumar
comment: Summary for all related to RTA

author: Muhannad Sh
comment: Always no service

author: nuhman mc
comment: Nize App .....can u give me ..application code...plssss

author: Ahmed Mahmoud
comment: Useful with good performance

author: sumesh s
comment: There is an issue in the licence field when tried to add the details, it accepts only 7 characters where as licence number itself is 8 characters.. Also, when u scan licence bar code, it successfully imports the data and shows correct licence number but it throws error when we press submit stating that "licence field has max 10 characters length". I think you need to update the data length for licence field and reaubmit the app, so that it would be useful for public

reply.author: Roads and Transport Authority
reply.content: Dear Sumesh, your problem is resolved, please update to v5.1

author: Sandanuwan Dhanushka
comment: Taking very long time to re-open the app once it is minimised. All I can see logo and please wait.....

reply.author: Roads and Transport Authority
reply.content: Dear Sandanuwan, I am sorry to hear that you are facing an issue with the App, please share your comments and feedback through app feedback

author: Nasir Alseeri
comment: The old version was running fine and I use it for everything related to RTA but this version doesn't even log me in. I almost got a parking fine because of this usless version.

reply.author: Roads and Transport Authority
reply.content: Dear Nasir, I am sorry to hear that you are facing an issue with the App, please share your comments and feedback through app feedback

author: Sreevisakh Sasikumar
comment: After login the application got stucked. I using note 4. Al became blank after logging in.

reply.author: Roads and Transport Authority
reply.content: Dear Sreevisakh, I am sorry to hear that you are facing an issue with the App,  To Help you fix the issue you are experiencing, Please contact our customer service Team on 8009090 or email us your details (email id & Mobile number) at ask@rta.ae

author: Saif Al Muhairi
comment: Doesn't allow me to pay other Emirate fines and shows as blocked, when on the website it is not blocked. Old version allowed payment of other Emirates fines.

reply.author: Roads and Transport Authority
reply.content: Dear Saif, your problem is resolved, please update to v5.1

author: Moataz M. M. Kamel
comment: Very badly designed and extremely slow

reply.author: Roads and Transport Authority
reply.content: Dear Moatz, I am sorry to hear that you are facing an issue with the App, please share your comments and feedback through app feedback

author: Maria Majid
comment: New update makes the app more efficient

author: Jaleel Taj
comment: Struck a lot.

reply.author: Roads and Transport Authority
reply.content: Dear Jaleel, I am sorry to hear that you are facing an issue with the App,  To Help you fix the issue you are experiencing, Please contact our customer service Team on 8009090 or email us your details (email id & Mobile number) at ask@rta.ae

author: Egypt Cairo
comment: Very wonderful work . Thanks RTA Dubai

author: Jamal Alf
comment: pathetic

author: Ivica Babic
comment: As so many before me said before, this app is TERRIBLY SLOW, time and nerve consuming. The old one was 1000 times better. There was no need for this disgrace. 4 months after the release, still the same. It's haram!

author: Mohammad Marei
comment: First of all thanks for your efforts.  Why copy paste functionality does not work on android? ?  Why Rta website account doesn't work on this app?? I had to create username on same email accout used on rta

author: Mohammed Shahvali Shaik
comment: It's really irritating these days as it's not connecting even if reinstall application still says unable to connect server try later ..i think this app developer don't care.

author: Dalia M. Noureldin
comment: The only service that works here is the fines payment. I put credit to pay for parkings and the button is always not active and I cant even buy the seasonal parking permit.

author: Adnan Shabbir
comment: Please revamp this app completely. I am a regular user of parking by app. It takes so long for this app to start, then keep searching zone, and then keep on asking for login everytime you open the app. By the time i forget the zone number. Previous app was so easy and fast.

reply.author: Roads and Transport Authority
reply.content:
Dear Adnan

Please update the App to get the new Revamped App RTA Dubai Drive.

author: Mohammed Hannoun
comment: Takes a long time to issue a single  parking ticket.the app its self is heavy is a lot of features are combined.

author: Anwar Hussain
comment: Servers are very slow they can't even handle login request.

author: Khaled Kamel
comment: Why so slow? Why App is not able to save user name and password? Why in 2017 I must login every time I need to use the app? And why this has not been fixed despite all the 1* reviews?

author: Shahid Abbas
comment: They always shown a server problem plz solve it
Very bad application, desnt recognise that im online and must always login, and must always link my account even though its already linked

author: Salem Aldhanhani
comment: Thanks for great services

author: Anjula Malshan
comment: This application is a must needed app and it doesn't work as it required. Each time need to login even if we select the remember me option. While about to extend the parking ticket the app gets stuck and we have to do it manually via SMS. Need tons of improvement UI wise and as well the app development wise.

author: Merlvin Reniva
comment: The App is very slow and always asking for log in and password. not convenient. Smart parking before was way better than this..Please do the needful. I wont be using this app anymore. waste of time!

author: Ashley John
comment: Extremely slow app. Everytime i have to enter my username and password. And takes too much time to load. Everytime i need to put a parking ticket, i spend atleast 5 mins on this app. Not at all practical.
